text:
* The inaugural edition of the Major League Cricket tournament is set to launch this summer.
* The tournament will feature a draft system, with teams selecting players to join their rosters.
* Notable players selected in the draft include:
	+ Liam Plunkett, former England World Cup winner, who will play for the San Francisco Unicorns.
	+ Aaron Finch, former Australia captain, who will captain the San Francisco Unicorns.
	+ Marcus Stoinis, all-rounder, who will play for the San Francisco Unicorns.
	+ Mitchell Marsh, who will play for the Seattle Orcas.
	+ Quinton de Kock, South Africa wicketkeeper, who will play for the Seattle Orcas.
	+ Anrich Nortje, South Africa bowler, who will play for DC Freedom.
	+ Wanindu Hasaranga, Sri Lanka spinner, who will play for DC Freedom.
* More high-profile overseas signings are expected in the coming weeks.
* The tournament's scheduling may conflict with the English summer, which means most England internationals will not be available to participate.

The MLC has begun its second season with two games played on the opening night, one in Morrisville, North Carolina, and the other in Grand Prairie, Texas. The defending champion MI New York (MI stands for Mumbai Indians) took on the Seattle Orcas, with MI NY making some tweaks to their uniform, including dropping the dark pants stripe and changing the side panels to a diamond pattern. Seattle's uniform remained largely the same as last year. The second game featured the Texas Super Kings hosting the LA Knight Riders, with LA toning down their gold sublimation and purple color. The article also mentioned that some teams, like the Washington Freedom and San Francisco Unicorns, have not played yet, but their uniforms have been revealed, with the Unicorns making a notable change to their jersey design. The MLC season will be played entirely in the month of July, with each of the six teams playing seven regular season games.

**Match Details:**

* Date: Friday, July 5, 2024
* Time: 3:30 p.m. ET
* Teams: Seattle Orcas vs. MI New York
* Venue: Not specified (but all games will be played at either Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas or Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina)

**Background:**

* This is the first week of the Major League Cricket season.
* Last year, the Seattle Orcas had the best record in the league (4-1), while MI New York finished in fourth place (2-3).
* The two teams met in the championship match last year, with MI New York winning the inaugural title.

**League Details:**

* Major League Cricket is a six-team T20 cricket league that began play in 2023.
* The entire league season will take place in July.
* All games will be played at one of two venues: Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas or Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina.

**How to Watch:**

* The match can be watched on Willow TV, which is available through Fubo.
* Start a free trial of Fubo to watch this contest and many other cricket matches from around the world.

* The Los Angeles Knight Riders will face the Texas Super Kings on Friday in the first week of the Major League Cricket season.
* Last season, the Super Kings finished second in the points table with three wins and two losses, while the Knight Riders finished last with one win and four losses.
* The two teams met in the first match of last season, with the Super Kings winning by 69 runs.
* The Major League Cricket is a six-team T20 cricket league that started in 2023, with all games played at either Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas or Church Street Park in North Carolina.
* The entire league season takes place in July, following the hosting of the T20 World Cup in the United States.
* The match between the Knight Riders and Super Kings will take place on Friday, July 5, 2024, at 7:30 p.m. ET and can be watched on Willow TV or through a Fubo trial.

The article reports on the opening match of the second season of Major League Cricket (MLC) in the USA, featuring Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAKR) against Texas Super Kings (TSK). Unmukt Chand, a former U19 World Cup-winning India captain, played a crucial role in LAKR's win, scoring a half-century (68 off 45 balls) to help his team reach a total of 162/7. Despite star players like David Miller and Andre Russell failing to score big, LAKR's bowling attack, led by Ali Khan's 3 wickets, restricted TSK to fall short by 12 runs. LAKR's next match is scheduled against San Francisco Unicorns on July 8.

The second edition of the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament is set to begin on July 5, 2024. The tournament will feature the same six teams as the previous edition, competing in a single round-robin league stage of 21 matches, followed by four playoff games. The final match will take place on July 28. The tournament will feature big-name players like Pat Cummins, Steve Smith, and Glenn Maxwell. The matches can be watched in the US on Willow, while international viewers can find broadcasting and streaming information on other platforms.

* The Washington Freedom won a thrilling match against MI New York in the 2024 Cognizant Major League Cricket tournament.
* The match was played at Church Street Park in Morrisville.
* Rain shortened the game, but the Washington Freedom emerged victorious by four runs using the Duckworth-Lewis-Stern (DLS) method.

* The San Francisco Unicorns will play their first match of the tournament against the Los Angeles Knight Riders on Sunday.
* The Unicorns have a strong bowling lineup featuring Pat Cummins, Haris Rauf, and Liam Plunkett, and a powerful batting lineup led by youngsters Jake Fraser McGurk and Fin Allen, with Corey Anderson as the captain.
* The Los Angeles Knight Riders have already won their second match of the tournament, defeating the Texas Super Kings by 12 runs after a dramatic collapse triggered by Ali Khan's three wickets in a single over.
* The upcoming match between the Unicorns and the Knight Riders will take place at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Texas, on Sunday at 7:30 PM local time (6:00 AM IST on Monday).

**Match 3: MI New York vs Washington Freedom**

* Date: July 6th

**Current Form of MI New York**

* Currently 1st on the points table with 1 win
* Top run scorer: Nicholas Pooran (62 runs)

* Key players: Saurabh Netravalkar, Travis Head, Rachin Ravindra, Andries Gous, Lockie Ferguson

**Players to Watch Out For**

* Andries Gous: Expected to be Washington Freedom's best batter this season
* Lockie Ferguson: Expected to play a big role for Washington Freedom with the ball

* The second match of the Major League Cricket 2024 will be played between Texas Super Kings and Los Angeles Knight Riders on July 6 at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas.
* The match will start at 06:00 AM IST (Indian Standard Time).
* The official broadcast rights of the tournament are held by Sony Sports Network, and Indian fans can watch the match on Sony Sports Network channels.

Note: The article also mentions an unrelated news about Hardik Pandya, but it is not relevant to the Major League Cricket tournament.

**Tournament Details:**

* The MLC 2024 tournament will be held in the USA's Texas and North Carolina from July 5th to July 28th.
* Six teams will participate in the tournament.
* The tournament will be played in a round-robin league format, with the top four teams advancing to the playoffs.
* The final will be held on July 29th at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Texas.

**Teams:**

* The six teams participating in the tournament are:
	+ MI New York (defending champions)
	+ Seattle Orcas
	+ Texas Super Kings
	+ LA Knight Riders
	+ San Francisco Unicorns
	+ Washington Freedom
* Four of the six teams are owned by Indian Premier League (IPL) franchises.

**Players:**

* The tournament will feature top international cricketers, including:
	+ Kieron Pollard (MI New York)
	+ Wayne Parnell and Quinton de Kock (Seattle Orcas)
	+ Faf du Plessis (Texas Super Kings)
	+ Sunil Narine (LA Knight Riders)
	+ Steve Smith, Glenn Maxwell, and Travis Head (Washington Freedom)
	+ Finn Allen (San Francisco Unicorns)

**Schedule:**

* The tournament will begin on July 5th with a rematch of last year's final between MI New York and Seattle Orcas.
* The schedule includes 21 matches, with the initial 15 matches split between two venues (Church Street Park and Grand Prairie Stadium) and the final six group matches and knockout fixtures held at the Grand Prairie Stadium.

**Match Details:**

* Match 3 was played between Washington Freedom and MI New York (MINY) at Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina.
* The match was rain-affected, and the result was determined by the Duckworth-Lewis-Stern (DLS) method.

**Result:**

* Washington Freedom won the match by 4 runs through the DLS method.
* This marks a strong start to their campaign.

**Key Performances:**

* Saurabh Netravalkar, the USA rising cricket star, was named 'Player of the Match' for his impressive bowling performance, claiming 3 wickets for 24 runs.
* Justin Dill supported Netravalkar with 3 wickets for 33 runs.
* Nicholas Pooran of MI New York scored a rapid 44 off 30 balls, while Rashid Khan scored 31 off 15 balls and Anrich Nortje scored 14 off 9 balls.
* Steve Smith, Washington Freedom's captain, played a captain's knock, scoring an unbeaten 46 off 28 balls, including 4 fours and 3 sixes, to anchor the chase.

**Match Result:** Washington Freedom defeated MI New York by 4 runs via the DLS Method in a rain-marred third match of MLC 2024 at Church Street Park in Morrisville.

**Key Performances:**

* Steve Smith of Washington Freedom scored an unbeaten 46 off 28 balls, including 4 fours and 3 sixes, to help his team win.
* Nicholas Pooran of MI New York scored 44 off 30 balls, but his efforts were not enough to secure a win for his team.
* Saurabh Netravalkar of Washington Freedom took 3 crucial wickets, including those of MI New York skipper Kieron Pollard, Rashid Khan, and Anrich Nortje.

**Match Highlights:**

* The match was cut short due to rain and lightning, with Washington Freedom ahead on DLS at 55/1 in 7.4 overs.
* MI New York struggled to score freely, losing wickets regularly, despite Pooran's valiant effort.
* Washington Freedom's Steve Smith's power-hitting in the final over of the powerplay took them ahead on DLS, which ultimately proved decisive.

* The article reports on a match between Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAKR) and Texas Super Kings (TSK) in the ongoing Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament.
* Unmukt Chand, a former Indian under-19 team captain, played a crucial role in LAKR's win, scoring a counterattacking half-century in the match.
* LAKR batted first and had a poor start, losing key wickets, but Chand's blistering knock helped them reach a total of 162 runs in 20 overs.
* Chand particularly targeted TSK bowler Naveen-ul-Haq, scoring 14 runs off one over, including two fours and a six.
* LAKR went on to win the match by 12 runs, restricting TSK to 150-8 in 20 overs, thanks to Chand's knock and Ali Khan's four-wicket haul.

In the second edition of the Major League Cricket tournament, MI New York played against Washington Freedom at Church Street Park, Morrisville. Washington Freedom won the toss and elected to field first, restricting MI New York to 154 runs thanks to three-wicket hauls from Saurabh Nethravalkar and Justin Dill. Nicholas Pooran top-scored with 44 runs for MI New York. In response, Washington Freedom lost an early wicket when Travis Head was dismissed by an exceptional catch by Pooran behind the stumps, thanks to a good length delivery from Ehsan Adil.

* The article mentions that Bangladesh's ace all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan is the sole representative of Bangladesh in the Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024.
* Shakib is playing for the Los Angeles Knight Riders in the MLC 2024.
* In the opening match against Texas Super Kings at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas, Shakib scored 18 off 13 balls and claimed one wicket, conceding 32 runs in three overs.
* Despite Shakib's decent performance, his team Los Angeles Knight Riders won the contest by 12 runs to begin the tournament on a winning note.

Note: There is no other information about the MLC 2024 tournament in the article beyond Shakib's performance in the opening match.

The Texas Super Kings (TSK), a team in the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament, have secured a sponsorship deal with Fandom Cricket, a sports marketing and entertainment firm. As part of the agreement, Fandom Cricket becomes the associate sponsor of TSK for the ongoing season, and their logo will be featured on the back of the team's headgear. This partnership aims to promote passion and performance in the tournament.

**Season Overview**: The second season of MLC has kicked off with an opening match between MI New York and Seattle Orcas, featuring six dynamic teams: Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, San Francisco Unicorns, Seattle Orcas, Texas Super Kings, and Washington Freedom.

**Tournament Structure**: Unlike the inaugural season, MLC Season 2 will follow an enhanced structure, with teams playing 7 league games each before progressing to the knockout phase. The final showdown is scheduled for July 28, with matches taking place in Morrisville and Dallas.

**Schedule and Fixtures**: The complete fixtures and match timings for MLC 2024 have been announced, with 21 league matches, an Eliminator, a Qualifier, a Challenger, and the Final.

**TV Channels and Live Streaming**: The tournament will be broadcast on various TV channels and live streaming platforms, including JioCinema (India), Prime Video (Australia and New Zealand), TNT Sports (UK and Ireland), Sling TV - Willow TV (USA and Canada), SuperSport (South Africa), Cricbuzz (Middle East and North Africa), A Sports (Pakistan), and ESPN+ (Sub Saharan Africa).

**Event Details:**

* The second edition of the MLC is set to start on July 6, 2024, and the final will take place on July 29, 2024.
* The defending champions, MI New York, will take on Seattle Orcas in the opening match at Church Street Park in Morrisville.
* The grand finale will be held at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas.

**Teams and Players:**

* Six teams are participating in the tournament, including MI New York, Seattle Orcas, San Francisco Unicorns, Washington Freedom, Texas Super Kings, and Los Angeles Knight Riders.
* Several well-known cricket players will participate, including Marcus Stoinis, Kieron Pollard, Andre Russell, Sunil Narine, Quinton de Kock, Faf du Plessis, Pat Cummins, Shakib Al Hasan, and others.

**Broadcasting and Commentators:**

* Sony Sports Network has acquired the exclusive television rights to broadcast the tournament in India.
* An all-star cast of commentators will feature in the tournament, including Sunil Gavaskar, Wasim Akram, Danny Morrison, and others.

**Background:**

* The MLC has gained attention from India's cricket fraternity and has contributed to the growth of cricket in the United States.
* The involvement of IPL teams, such as Mumbai Indians, Chennai Super Kings, and Kolkata Knight Riders, has added excitement for their fan bases.

**Tournament Background**: The MLC is a T20 franchise league in the USA, similar to the IPL. The inaugural edition was held in 2023, with MI New York emerging as the winner.

**2024 Season**: The second season of MLC is set to return in 2024, featuring 6 teams: MI New York, Los Angeles Knight Riders, Texas Super Kings, and three others (not specified). The teams will play each other in a round-robin format, with the top four advancing to the playoffs.

**Format**: The playoffs will consist of a Qualifier (top two teams), an Eliminator (third and fourth teams), and a Challenger (winner of Eliminator vs. loser of Qualifier). The winner of the Challenger will play in the final.

**Match Schedule and Timings**: The full schedule was announced on May 7. Matches will start at different times in India due to the USA's multiple time zones, with most games beginning at 6:00 AM, and some at 1:00 AM and 12:30 AM.

**Match Result:** Los Angeles Knight Riders (LAKR) won against Texas Super Kings by 12 runs in the second match of MLC 2024.

**Key Moments:**

* Derone Davis took a stunning catch in the 14th over of the innings to dismiss Joshua Tromp, which proved to be a vital wicket.
* Texas Super Kings lost four wickets for 17 runs after Tromp's dismissal, leading to their defeat.
* Devon Conway top-scored for Texas Super Kings with 53 off 39 balls.
* Unmukt Chand played a brilliant innings for LAKR, scoring 68 off 45 balls, to help his team reach a competitive total of 162-7 in 20 overs.

**Notable Performances:**

* Ali Khan was the pick of LAKR's bowlers, taking 4-33 in four overs.
* Spencer Johnson bowled excellently for LAKR, taking 2-18 in 4 overs.
* Zia-ul-Haq, Aaron Hardie, and Marcus Stoinis picked up 2 wickets apiece for Texas Super Kings.

**Tournament Context:**

* This was the first match for both teams in MLC 2024.
* LAKR made a great start to their campaign, having finished last in the points table in MLC 2023 with just one win from five matches.

**Match Details:**
The first match of the 2024 MLC season is between MI New York and Seattle Orcas, the finalists of the inaugural season.

**Toss Update:**
MI New York won the toss and elected to field first against Seattle Orcas. Heinrich Klaasen, the Seattle Orcas captain, believes the wicket won't change much, and they would have bowled first anyway. Kieron Pollard, the MI New York captain, is unsure about the track and wants to see how it plays out.

**Teams:**
The playing XIs for both teams are:

Seattle Orcas: Quinton de Kock (w), Aaron Jones, Nauman Anwar, Heinrich Klaasen (c), Michael Bracewell, Shubham Ranjane, Imad Wasim, Harmeet Singh, Cameron Gannon, Nandre Burger, and Zaman Khan.

MI New York: Steven Taylor, Monank Patel, Nicholas Pooran (w), Shayan Jahangir, Tim David, Kieron Pollard (c), Rashid Khan, Ruben Clinton, Ehsan Adil, Trent Boult, and Anrich Nortje.

**Pitch Report:**
According to Scott Styris, the pitch is a new one, with square boundaries of 206 ft and 217 ft, and a straight boundary of 240 ft. The ball comes onto the bat well, and there may be some seam movement due to the live, green grass. Overall, it's a very good batting pitch.
